summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Bergason Property Services inventory management dashboard. All major features tested successfully including property inventory creation, health & safety tracking, room-by-room inventory with 23 predefined rooms, photo uploads, signature workflow, and document verification.
passed_tests: Dashboard loads correctly with empty state and existing inventories
Create inventory form with Property Overview, Health & Safety, and Rooms sections
Meter information entry with photo uploads
Safety equipment tracking with add/remove functionality
All 23 predefined rooms present and functional
Room accordion functionality and item addition
Save inventory and redirect to preview page
Signature page with canvas drawing and form validation
Verification page showing authentic signed document
Proper branding with black/cream colors and Bergason logo
All backend API endpoints (13/13 tests passed)
Complete user workflow from creation to verification
